item.description:
Hosted by DJ On & On and the lovely Hilary Clare in conjunction with 617 Live!

Jeopardy Style Questions, Prizes by PBR and Good Life

Sign up around 7 PM

Trivia starts around 8 PM

Questions range from extremely novice to music-nerd status.

Physical Challenge Judged By Big Shug & DJ 7L

No Dress Code and No Cover

Join a team or come out and cheer on your fellow drinking buddies.

Good Life dinner menu

Good Life drink menu

MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

MBTA:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route five (5) minute walk from Orange Line Downtown Crossing subway station or ten (10) minute walk from Red Line/Commuter Rail South Station subway station.
item.name: Hip Hop Trivia Happy Hour
